pkgmetadata.longdescription: Differential Pattern Analysis via Linear Modeling // Individual gene expression patterns are encoded into a series of eigenvector patterns ('WGCNA' package). Using the framework of linear model-based differential expression comparisons ('limma' package), time-course expression patterns for genes in different conditions are compared and analyzed for significant pattern changes. For reference, see Kathleen Greenham, Ryan C Sartor, Stevan Zorich, Ping Lou, Todd C Mockler and C. Robertson McClung (2020) doi:10.1101/2020.04.03.024281.
